description:
The Hackadolls return to Ayame (their subject from episode 1) to see
how she`s enjoying life as a born-again otaku. But Ayame`s friend`s
upcoming marriage is making her rethink over her life`s choices...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Hacka Doll ni Comiket mo Omakase Desu!
Hackadolls Can Handle Anything, Even Comiket
Les Hacka Dolls s`occupent aussi du Comiket
ハッカドールにコミケもおまかせですっ
